title: Logo on dribbble

 DIN Neuzeit Grotesk

author: Joker

comments.content:
I think Budapest and the date are two different typefaces.

Budapest appears to be DIN Neuzeit Grotesk:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/din-neuzeit-grotesk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130756/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/din-neuzeit-grotesk/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/din-neuzeit-grotesk/")

The date is too small for a positive ID, but it looks like Gill Sans:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/gill-sans/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317130756/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/gill-sans/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/mti/gill-sans/")
